channel.title: Linguistics on Makotori
channel.description: Recent content in Linguistics on Makotori

item.title: Syntax
item.description: Source for most of this: [1] Hierarchical Organization of Language Mental computations of language: performed on a hierarchically organized structure, not on a linear string of words How are words organized into a sentence? H1: A sentence is a collection words? NO! Doesn’t account for word order H2: A sentence is an ordered collection of words? NO! Can’t tell us why sentence a is good and b is bad NO!
